definitions.description: Table that holds activities from external sources

constantValues: Table that holds activities from external sources

members.name: externalactivityId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances

members.name: TTLInSeconds
members.description: Time to live in seconds.

members.name: partitionId
members.description: Logical partition id. A logical partition consists of a set of records with same partition id.

constantValues: Logical partition id. A logical partition consists of a set of records with same partition id.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: accountid
members.description: Comprehensive information about a supplier, customer, third-party manufacturer, or investee.

constantValues: Comprehensive information about a supplier, customer, third-party manufacturer, or investee.

members.name: businesstraveltypeid
members.description: Unique identifier related to the business travel type. Used to identify emission factors.

constantValues: Unique identifier related to the business travel type. Used to identify emission factors.

members.name: consumptionenddate
members.description: Comprehensive information about a supplier, customer, third-party manufacturer, or investee.

constantValues: Comprehensive information about a supplier, customer, third-party manufacturer, or investee.

members.name: consumptionstartdate
members.description: Comprehensive information about a supplier, customer, third-party manufacturer, or investee.

constantValues: Comprehensive information about a supplier, customer, third-party manufacturer, or investee.

members.name: dataqualitytype
members.description: Description of the data quality which identifies if the data is actual, estimated, or other descriptors of the data.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'dataqualitytype_display' is added to the 'ExternalActivity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'dataqualitytype'
supportingAttribute.name: dataqualitytype_display

constantValues: Description of the data quality which identifies if the data is actual, estimated, or other descriptors of the data.

members.name: disposalmethodid
members.description: Method of waste disposal, such as compost or recycle.

constantValues: Method of waste disposal, such as compost or recycle.

members.name: employeecommutingtypeid
members.description: Unique identifier related to the employee commuting type. Used to identify emission factors.

constantValues: Unique identifier related to the employee commuting type. Used to identify emission factors.

members.name: fueltypeid
members.description: Unique identifier for the fuel type associated with combustion or supply chain fuel usage.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the fuel type associated with combustion or supply chain fuel usage.

members.name: greenhousegas
members.description: Unique identifier for the greenhouse gas associated with the fugitive emission.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the greenhouse gas associated with the fugitive emission.

members.name: industrialprocesstypeid
members.description: Unique identifier for the industrial process type associated with the industrial process

constantValues: Unique identifier for the industrial process type associated with the industrial process

members.name: isrenewable
members.description: Identifier used to determine if the source electric energy is renewable or not.

constantValues: Identifier used to determine if the source electric energy is renewable or not.

members.name: materialid
members.description: Material of waste, such as aluminum.

constantValues: Material of waste, such as aluminum.

members.name: organizationalunitid
members.description: Unique identifier for the organizational unit associated with the external activity.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the organizational unit associated with the external activity.

members.name: quantity
members.description: Generic quanity field associated with activity entities.

constantValues: Generic quanity field associated with activity entities.

members.name: quantityunit
members.description: Unit associated with the quantity field

constantValues: Unit associated with the quantity field

members.name: spendtypeid
members.description: Unique identifier for the spend type associated with the purchased good and service.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the spend type associated with the purchased good and service.

members.name: transactiondate
members.description: Date associated with the actual date when the transaction occurred.

constantValues: Date associated with the actual date when the transaction occurred.

members.name: transportationanddistributiontype
members.description: Marks what type of transportation and distribution this record represents.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'transportationanddistributiontype_display' is added to the 'ExternalActivity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'transportationanddistributiontype'
supportingAttribute.name: transportationanddistributiontype_display

constantValues: Marks what type of transportation and distribution this record represents.

members.name: transportmode
members.description: The transport mode that corresponds to this transportation and distribution activity.

constantValues: The transport mode that corresponds to this transportation and distribution activity.

members.name: vehicletype
members.description: Unique identifier for the vehicle type associated with combustion or supply chain transportation activities.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the vehicle type associated with combustion or supply chain transportation activities.
